oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: United States Army general rules, 1917 May 8
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Slocum, Herbert J.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A 1917 set of general rules governing members of training companies particularly in respect to the highest possible standards in efficiency, behavior, appearance and morals in training camps.
